name: Oleksii Kachan
title: Full Stack Software Engineer & UI/UX Developer
bio_legacy: Hello there! I am a professional software engineer. My passion is helping business to focus only on business - enterprise automation on higher levels, e.g. MES & ERP System design & development. Also helping business to improve business indicators by getting more customers & sales by implementing marketing projects, e.g. Landing pages.

bio.introduction: Hello there! I am a professional software engineer.
passions: Helping business to focus only on business - enterprise automation on higher levels, e.g. MES & ERP System design & development
Helping business to improve business indicators by getting more customers & sales by implementing marketing projects, e.g. Landing pages
bio.stackIntroduction: I am an Enterprise Software Developer. Mainly I use 2 stacks of technologies:
techStacks: .NET Stack (C#, ASP.NET, WPF, Win. Forms, WCF, MS SQL Server etc.)

images.imageDescription: AGW IP - a heart of OLSOM software for manufacturing.
AGW MES - a powerful, flexible and scalable Manufacturing Execution System that is easily expanded with business requirements to maximize performance.
AGW WMS provides control and visibility of your inventory from the time you receive a shipment until finished goods leave your warehouse.

projectDescription.content: |italic|AGW IP|-| is a complex manufacturing environment that deals with significant volumes of heterogeneous design and production data. Efficient collection, consolidation, transformation and delivery of these data in secure and timely manner is a key task of manufacturing IT on the way of organization towards |bold|cloud infrastructure|-|.

|italic|AGW MES|-| is an |bold|ISA95|-| compliant |bold|web-based product|-| that provides a broad and flexible platform to optimize manufacturing operations. From simple to complex operations, |italic|AGW MES|-| manages the entire build process from start to finish providing operators detailed step-by-step directions and controlling their completion. |bold|Visualization|-| capabilities give you |bold|real-time visibility|-| and historical analytics over all manufacturing operations, enabling you to improve throughput, quality, agility and compliance. |italic|AGW MES|-| is a powerful, flexible and scalable |bold|Manufacturing Execution System|-| that is easily expanded with business requirements to maximize performance.

|italic|AGW WMS|-| provides control and visibility of your inventory from the time you receive a shipment until finished goods leave your warehouse. |italic|AGW WMS|-| is designed to |bold|optimize movement|-| of your inventory across your facility. From materials receiving down through the manufacturing process until packing and shipping to the customer |italic|AGW WMS|-| helps to direct your inventory in an optimal way providing |bold|up-to-the-minute information|-| on the quantity, location, status, and history of every item including work-in-process and finished goods.
The project work consisted of two parallel streams: development and support.

list: Overriding / Supporting legacy code (transfering one of the services from ASP.NET Forms to ASP.NET MVC)
Implement different settings storage methods (as xml configuration, as database entity)
Configuring & Deploying system on customers side
Implement 'on demand' customer-specific features (batch loading, specific production routing)

projects.title: TDM (Tools Data Manager). Manufacturing data collection and management solution

projectDescription.content: |italic|Tools Data Manager ("TDM")|-| is an advanced manufacturing data collection and management solution that features comprehensive functionality for |bold|torque data capture|-| and management. |italic|TDM|-| is designed to simplify the challenge of connecting, extracting, associating, archiving, analyzing and mobilizing manufacturing data generated by localized shop-floor devices; such as, torque assembly systems, process PLCs, testing systems such as Labview, quality systems and etc. From |bold|quality & test data|-| to critical process data, |italic|TDM|-| aggregates all disparate localized manufacturing data into a single, central database and operating tool offering total control and collaboration.

|italic|TDM|-| is one of the first commercially designed software tools that integrates the function of |bold|device connectivity|-| into the core software tool including connectivity, data selection, data identity and many other useful functions.
The project work consisted of two parallel streams: development and support.

list: Configuring & Deploying system on customers side
Implement 'on demand' customer-specific features (implement agw-like routing)

projectDescription.content: |bold|Hyperloop|-| is a conceptual, high-speed transportation system initially proposed by |bold|Elon Musk|-|. The concept consists of passenger and cargo pods being propelled at up to 760 mph in a low pressure tube using sustainable and cost-efficient energy. To accelerate its development, |bold|SpaceX|-| is hosted a competition for engineering teams to |bold|design|-| their own hyperloop pods and test them at their facility in |italic|Hawthorne, California|-|.
rLoop is |bold|open-sourced|-|, |bold|crowd-sourced|-| & |bold|crowsfunded|-| |italic|community|-|. I was a member of 2 teams: |bold|Systems Team|-| & |bold|Software Team|-|

list: Leading small team < 5 people of designers & developers on UI/UX
Writing Human-Machine Interface section for Telemetry and Control stations in System Design Document (SDD)

projectDescription.content: I researched our processes and defined the sets of trackable data. Based on that I developed low-fidelity mock-ups.

|bold|Reverse engineering|-| of |italic|ladder-logic|-| based corrugated industrial cardboard |bold|production software|-| to get complete networking system. System was developed using ladder logic so I had to understand what is going on there and then create some |bold|technical documentation|-| on how this system works.

|bold|Multi-threaded|-| Windows |italic|service|-| that transfers files locally and/or remotely via |bold|FTP|-| and is configured with *.ini file. All the service events, faults, warnings are logged into local txt file and |bold|Windows system log|-|.

My very first branding project was creating brand of myself. I defined 2 main colors, created logo, designed 2-side business card. Business card does not have title of person, because I do not want to put myself into frames of who I can be.
I created brand for my mother as for financial services provider. I defined 2 main colors, created logo, designed 2-side business card.

I created brand for financial consultant from Ukraine. I defined 2 main colors, created logo, designed 2-side business card and created graphic candle-chart as visual element for business card. Candle-chart displays that person is connected with advanced financial operations.

experience.position: Technician Programmer of administrative and economic department
responsibilities: System administration of the enterprise using 1C: Enterprise (ERP-like platform)
Maintenance of computers, peripheral and specialized equipment (common printers, Zebra printers, electronic scales, fiscal cash registers, etc.)
Development and support of the company's products: AGW Automitive Manufacturing Solution; TDM (Tools Data Manager) for automotive industry
Development and support of the client projects based on company's products (1-3-tier automotive manufacturers (Volkswagen, Opel, Tesla, etc.)
